info.+content: Sanchome no Tama: Uchi no Tama Shirimasenka?
淘氣貓 喵喵三丁目
３丁目のタマ　うちのタマ知りませんか？

The characters are Tama, Momo, Wocket, Tiggle, Rockney, Pimmy, Bupkus, Bengpu, and Chopin. There is no consistent plot. Tama and his friends just have little, family friendly, adventures every episode. The only consistency is when a new friend is made one episode and flash backs.
"Tama and Friends" by Peter Thom [English Version]
#1: "Ai wa Genki desu" (愛は元気です) by Yumi Tanimura (eps 1-9)
#2: "Genki Dashite yo" (元気だしてよ) by Yumi Tanimura (eps 10-35)
#1: "Bokura Wa Nakama Da Tama Ondo" (ボクらは仲間だタマ音頭) by Hiroko Kasahara
#2: "Mitsuami Hippatte" (みつあみ引っ張って) by Yuko Kumai
